ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Detecting and discouraging doomscrolling behavior.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ YOLOv11 pose estimation for keypoint tracking â€¢ YOLO object detection for phone detection â€¢ Heuristics for detecting reclined posture based on hip/shoulder alignment â€¢ Heuristics for detecting phone holding based on wrist proximity â€¢ Overlay of results on webcam feed with a spoofed penalty counter
ðŸ“– Summary: The Doomscrolling Detector is a computer vision pipeline that identifies when a user is reclined and using their phone, indicative of doomscrolling behavior. It uses pose estimation and object detection to flag these instances, and includes a spoofed penalty counter as a humorous deterrent.
